segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, cascading onto the cabinet doors and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, yet she doesn't seem to notice the water at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on drying that plate, completely oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and it looks like he might fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated that the woman isn't paying attention to the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, her hand outstretched, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies while their mother is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so serene, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is, standing in a puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, unaware of the potential disasters around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
